metadata.title: CVE-2024-26753 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:crypto: virtio/akcipher - Fix stack overflow on memcpysizeof(struct virtio_crypto_akcipher_session_para) is less thansizeof(struct virtio_crypto_op_ctrl_req::u), copying more bytes fromstack variable leads stack overflow. Clang reports this issue bycommands:make -j CC=clang-14 mrproper >/dev/null 2>&1make -j O=/tmp/crypto-build CC=clang-14 allmodconfig >/dev/null 2>&1make -j O=/tmp/crypto-build W=1 CC=clang-14 drivers/crypto/virtio/  virtio_crypto_akcipher_algs.o

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
